_description: A song based on the antiphon ‘O clavis Dauid’, etc. — three 5-line stanzas (abaab, lines 3 & 4 identical) and a 7-line Latin burden: O clavis dauid inclita / Dans viam in portis / [1 & 2 repeated] / Educ nos de carcere [repeated] / Et de vmbra mortis

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
O dauid þow nobell keyCepter of þe howse of
                    israell…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…For that thou losest no many may byndeAnd þat þu
                    losest may no man bynde
